sentences.en: Columbia Pictures paid him a six-figure sum for the film rights.
sentences.cn: 哥伦比亚影业公司付给他一笔6位数的电影版权费。

sentences.en: Even the relatively modest sum of £50,000 now seems beyond his reach.
sentences.cn: 现在即使是相对来说并不算多的5万英镑对他来说也是遥不可及的。

sentences.en: For his first book he received the princely sum of $ 400.
sentences.cn: 他写第一本书得到了400元“巨款”.

sentences.en: He owes me a large sum of money .
sentences.cn: 他欠我一大笔钱。

sentences.en: He owes me a large sum of money.

sentences.en: He was paid an undisclosed sum.
sentences.cn: 他得到了一笔数目不详的钱。

sentences.en: I was good at sums at school.
sentences.cn: 我上学时擅长算术。

sentences.en: In sum, the two countries are now true economic partners.
sentences.cn: 总而言之，两国目前是真正的经济合作伙伴。

sentences.en: It is a situation, in sum, devoid of logic.
sentences.cn: 总之，该情况毫无逻辑。

sentences.en: It'll cost them the princely sum of seventy-five pounds.
sentences.cn: 这将花费他们75英镑巨款。

sentences.en: Nothing about this sum has come to light.
sentences.cn: 关于这笔钱人们一无所知。

sentences.cn: 概括了当天的新闻；以扼要的重述结束了报告

sentences.en: That small room contained the sum total of the family's possessions.
sentences.cn: 那个小房间放着这家人的全部家当。

sentences.en: The doctor was prepared to do the operation for a large sum.
sentences.cn: 医生做这个手术需要收取高额费用。

sentences.en: The guests had each paid £250, no trifling sum.
sentences.cn: 客人每位付了250英镑，可不是一笔小数目。

sentences.en: The sum of all the angles of a triangle is 180 degrees.
sentences.cn: 三角形内角总和为180度。

sentences.en: The sum of evidence points to the crime resting on them.
sentences.cn: 所有证据都表明该犯罪乃他们所为.

sentences.en: this interpretation does little, in sum, to add to our understanding.
sentences.cn: 总而言之，这个解释没有增进我们的理解。

sentences.en: We have already seen the sum total of his attributes.
sentences.cn: 我们已经见识了他所有的那点儿品质。

sentences.en: You owe a certain person a sum of money.
sentences.cn: 你欠某人一笔钱。

sentences.en: You will have to pay the sum of the two sets of costs.
sentences.cn: 你得支付那两笔费用的总和。
